name: TKOP Combo Test Game [Win Update]
description:
TKOP Combo Test Game is a little test file I made to test out the combo system I will use in my upcoming game The Knock-Out Punch. In it you could press the keys "A" "S" or "D" in a specific combo in order to produce a small red cube. You (Or another person) could also hold "J" "K" "L" to do the opponents combo if you download the windows version 2 update. Holding the keys down spawns out a stream of them.

--Included in the download files of Version 1 MAC/WIN are some wallpapers from the logos of The Knock-Out Punch and the motion test of one of the characters, Polaroid.
